name: Duck Adventures REWIND
description:
This is a Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 Entry

This Game is made in one week solo. The GAME is not finished yet. Levels are missing and bugs expected. Please leave a comment and Feedback. As it will help me a lot.

----

Fun Platformer

This is a Jump and Run game. The main goal is to finish the level in time. You can find Timestone, which will make you younger or older. With each age there will be advantages or disadvantages: use them wisely. (The Timer also changes) .

AN ADVENTURE OF THE ONE AND ONLY DUCK

----

This is my third Game Jam and my first one solo. I am really glad that I am able to submit something although the game is not the game that I imagined first.

Some Credits 

thx to Anthony for the sprites (he creates sick art)

thx to Pazzle for the mental support
